lead_paragraph: Violence broke out in a “civilian on civilian” confrontation during protests in the city’s Uptown district over the death of Keith Scott.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Emily Harris, Erica Berenstein and Megan Specia from Charlotte, and Yamiche Alcindor, Jonah Engel Bromwich, Niraj Chokshi, Christopher Mele and Timothy Williams from New York. Alain Delaquérière contributed research.
byline.original: By RICHARD FAUSSET and ALAN BLINDER

headline.print_headline: More Violence Hits Charlotte After Shooting
headline.main: Man Is Shot in Charlotte as Unrest Stretches to Second Night

snippet: Violence broke out in a “civilian on civilian” confrontation during protests in the city’s Uptown district over the death of Keith Scott....
abstract: Demonstration takes deadly turn in Charlotte, NC, when unidentified man is shot and gravely wounded by civilian during second night of protests over police shooting of unarmed black man Keith L Scott.
